test:
.power Vdd=1
.thresholds Vol=0 Vil=0.1 Vih=0.9 Voh=1

.group inputs A[1:0] // no carry in
.group outputs vout
.mode gate

.cycle assert inputs tran 99n sample outputs tran 1n

00 L
11 H
01 H
00 L
11 H


.plot B(A[1:0])
.plot B(vout)

.power Vdd=1
.thresholds Vol=0 Vil=0.1 Vih=0.9 Voh=1

.group inputs A[3:0] B[3:0]
.group outputs vout[3:0]

.mode gate

.cycle assert inputs tran 99n sample outputs tran 1n


0000 0000 LLLL // A[3:0]=0000 B[3:0]=0000
0000 1111 LLLL // A[3:0]=0000 B[3:0]=1111
0000 1010 LLLL // A[3:0]=0000 B[3:0]=1010
0000 0000 LLLL // A[3:0]=0000 B[3:0]=0000



.plot B(A[3:0])
.plot B(B[3:0])
.plot B(vout[3:0])

schematic.text: This buffer has an input width of 2
